name: builder
desc: Eskema Builder API

name: $string
desc: Type specific builders

name: b
desc: Create a new builder instance. See builder.

name: builder
desc: Create a new builder instance. See builder.

name: builder.core
desc: Core builder functionality and chain logic.

name: BaseBuilder
desc: Base functionality shared by all typed builders.

name: add
desc: Add a validator to the chain.

name: build
desc: Build resulting validator.

name: deepEq
desc: Require the value to be deeply equal to the specified value.

name: eq
desc: Require the value to be equal to the specified value.

name: error
desc: Override final error message (retains codes).

name: not
desc:
Return a negated version of the builder
(the negation flag is consumed by the next added validator)

name: nullable
desc: Mark current chain nullable (null accepted as valid).

name: oneOf
desc: Require the value to be one of the specified options.

name: optional
desc: Mark current chain optional (skipped when key absent).

name: validate
desc: Convenience validate (sync only chain).

name: validateAsync
desc: Convenience validateAsync (mixed / async).

name: wrap
desc: Wrap the current chain with a custom function.

name: Chain
desc: Internal accumulator for a builder chain.

name: add
desc:
Adds a validator to the appropriate position in the chain.
Pre-coercion validators go before coercion, post-coercion validators go after.

name: addPrefix
desc:
Adds a prefix value-mapping validator that runs before coercion and post-validators.
Used for operations like pluckValue that extract values from containers.

name: build
desc: Builds the final validator by composing all chain elements in the correct order.

name: setTransform
desc: Sets a type coercion transformer with optional pre-validator preservation.

name: wrap
desc: Wraps all validators at the current position with a wrapper function.

name: CoercionKind
desc: Kind of coercion applied to the chain (single pivot allowed).

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: CustomPivot
desc: Represents a custom pivot for extensibility.

name: builder.mixins
desc: Builder mixins providing type-specific validation methods.

name: BoolMixin
desc: Mixin providing boolean-specific validation methods.

name: isTrue
desc: Validate that the boolean value is true.

name: ComparisonMixin
desc: Mixin providing comparison validation methods.

name: ContainsMixin
desc: Mixin providing contains validation methods.

name: contains
desc: Validate that the value contains the specified element.

name: DateTimeMixin
desc: Mixin providing DateTime-specific validation methods.

name: after
desc: Validate that the DateTime is after the specified date.

name: before
desc: Validate that the DateTime is before the specified date.

name: betweenDates
desc:
Validate that the DateTime is within the specified date range.
@return The builder for chaining

name: inFuture
desc: Validate that the DateTime is in the future.

name: inPast
desc: Validate that the DateTime is in the past.

name: sameDay
desc: Validate that the DateTime is on the same day as the specified date.

name: EmptyMixin
desc: Mixin providing empty validation methods.

name: empty
desc: Validate that the value is empty.

name: IterableMixin
desc: Mixin providing iterable-specific validation methods.

name: each
desc: Validate that each element in the iterable satisfies the provided validator.

name: JsonMixin
desc: Mixin providing JSON-specific validation methods.

name: jsonArray
desc: Validate that the value is a valid JSON array.

name: jsonArrayEach
desc: Validate that each element in a JSON array satisfies the provided validator.

name: jsonArrayLen
desc: Validate the length of a JSON array.

name: jsonContainer
desc: Validate that the value is a valid JSON container (object or array).

name: jsonObject
desc: Validate that the value is a valid JSON object.

name: jsonRequiresKeys
desc: Validate that the JSON object contains all required keys.

name: LengthMixin
desc: Mixin providing length validation methods.

name: length
desc: Validate that the length matches all the provided validators.

name: lengthMax
desc: Validate that the length is at most the specified maximum.

name: lengthMin
desc: Validate that the length is at least the specified minimum.

name: lengthRange
desc: Validate that the length is within the specified range.

name: MapMixin
desc: Mixin providing map-specific validation methods.

name: containsKey
desc: Validate that the map contains the specified key.

name: flattenKeys
desc: Flatten nested map keys using the specified delimiter.

name: pick
desc: Extract only the specified keys from the map.

name: pluck
desc:
Extract a single key from the map, keeping the map structure.
@return The builder for chaining

name: pluckValue
desc:
Extract a single value from the map, returning a GenericBuilder for further operations.
@return A GenericBuilder for the extracted value

name: schema
desc: Validate the map against a schema where keys are optional unless specified.

name: strict
desc: Validate the map against a strict schema where all keys must be present and match the validators.

name: NumberMixin
desc: Mixin providing number-specific validation methods.

name: between
desc: Validate that the number is within the specified range.

name: gt
desc: Validate that the number is greater than the specified value.

name: gte
desc: Validate that the number is greater than or equal to the specified value.

name: lt
desc: Validate that the number is less than the specified value.

name: lte
desc: Validate that the number is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: StringMixin
desc: Mixin providing string-specific validation methods.

name: boolString
desc: Validate that the string can be parsed as a boolean.

name: collapseWhitespace
desc: Normalize the string by collapsing multiple whitespace characters into single spaces.

name: doubleString
desc: Validate that the string can be parsed as a double.

name: email
desc: Validate that the string is a valid email address.

name: intString
desc: Validate that the string can be parsed as an integer.

name: isDate
desc: Validate that the string is a valid DateTime format.

name: lowerCase
desc: Validate that the string contains only lowercase characters.

name: matches
desc: Validate that the string matches the provided regular expression pattern.

name: numString
desc: Validate that the string can be parsed as a number.

name: strictUrl
desc: Validate that the string is a valid URL with strict requirements.

name: toLowerCase
desc: Convert the string to lowercase.

name: toUpperCase
desc: Convert the string to uppercase.

name: trim
desc: Normalize the string by trimming whitespace from both ends.

name: upperCase
desc: Validate that the string contains only uppercase characters.

name: url
desc: Validate that the string is a valid URL.

name: TransformerMixin
desc: Mixin providing type transformation methods for builders.

name: toBigInt
desc: Transform the value to a BigInt.

name: toBool
desc: Transform the value to a boolean using standard parsing.

name: toBoolLenient
desc: Transform the value to a boolean using lenient parsing.

name: toBoolStrict
desc: Transform the value to a boolean using strict parsing.

name: toDateTime
desc: Transform string to DateTime using standard parsing.

name: toDouble
desc: Transform the value to a double using standard parsing.

name: toInt
desc: Transform the value to an integer using standard parsing.

name: toIntSafe
desc: Transform the value to an integer using safe parsing (returns null on failure).

name: toIntStrict
desc: Transform the value to an integer using strict parsing (no fallback to 0).

name: toJson
desc: Transform JSON string to decoded object (Map/List).

name: toNum
desc: Transform the value to a number (int or double).

name: toString_
desc: Transform the value to a string.

name: use
desc: Apply a custom transformation using the provided pivot.

name: builder.type_builders
desc: Type-specific builder classes for the fluent validation API.

name: BoolBuilder
desc: Builder for boolean validations with boolean-specific methods.

name: DateTimeBuilder
desc: Builder for DateTime validations with date/time-specific methods.

name: DoubleBuilder
desc: Builder for double validations, inherits from NumberBuilder.

name: GenericBuilder
desc: Generic builder that supports all validation methods.

name: IntBuilder
desc: Builder for integer validations, inherits from NumberBuilder.

name: IterableBuilder
desc: Builder for iterable validations with length and iteration methods.

name: JsonDecodedBuilder
desc: Builder for JSON-decoded data with both map and iterable methods.

name: ListBuilder
desc: Builder for list validations, inherits from IterableBuilder.

name: MapBuilder
desc: Builder for map validations with map-specific methods.

name: NumberBuilder
desc: Builder for number validations with numeric comparison methods.

name: RootBuilder
desc: Root builder that provides entry points for different data types.

name: bool
desc: Expect a bool; returns a BoolBuilder with boolean-specific methods.

name: dateTime
desc: Expect a DateTime; returns a DateTimeBuilder with date/time methods.

name: double_
desc: Expect a double; returns a DoubleBuilder with double-specific methods.

name: int_
desc: Expect an int; returns an IntBuilder with integer-specific methods.

name: iterable
desc: Expect an Iterable; returns an IterableBuilder with collection methods.

name: list
desc: Expect a List; returns a ListBuilder with list-specific methods.

name: map
desc: Expect a Map; returns a MapBuilder with map-specific methods.

name: number
desc: Expect a number (int or double); returns a NumberBuilder with numeric methods.

name: set
desc: Expect a Set; returns a SetBuilder with set-specific methods.

name: string
desc: Expect a String; returns a StringBuilder with stringâ€‘specific methods.

name: type
desc: Generic type guard (rarely needed; concrete helpers preferred).

name: SetBuilder
desc: Builder for set validations, inherits from IterableBuilder.

name: StringBuilder
desc: Builder for string validations with string-specific methods.

name: resolve
desc: Creates a provider validator that depends on the parent object.

name: when
desc: Creates a conditional validator. It's conditional based on some other field in the eskema.

name: error_format
desc: Utilities for formatting validation / exception messages in a consistent, descriptive way.

name: ResultFormatting
desc: Extension to access detailed formatting directly on Result.

name: buildValidationFailureMessage
desc: Build a standardized, human friendly message for a failed Result.

name: buildValidationMessage
eskema
desc:
Eskema is a small, composable runtime validation library for Dart. It helps you validate
dynamic values (JSON, Maps, Lists, primitives) with readable validators and clear error messages.

name: $b
desc: Pre-built builder instance. See builder.

name: $builder
desc: Pre-built builder instance. See builder.

name: $isBool
desc:
Cached instance of isBool.
Validates that the value is a bool.

name: $isBoolString
desc:
Cached instance of isBoolString.
Validates that the string can be parsed as a boolean.

name: $isDate
desc:
Cached instance of isDate.
Validates that the string is a valid DateTime format.

name: $isDateTime
desc:
Cached instance of isDateTime.
Validates that the value is a DateTime.

name: $isDouble
desc:
Cached instance of isDouble.
Validates that the value is a double.

name: $isDoubleString
desc:
Cached instance of isDoubleString.
Validates that the string can be parsed as a double.

name: $isEmail
desc:
Cached instance of isEmail.
Validates that the string is a valid email address.

name: $isEnum
desc:
Cached instance of isEnum.
Validates that the value is an enum value.

name: $isFunction
desc:
Cached instance of isFunction.
Validates that the value is a Function.

name: $isFuture
desc:
Cached instance of isFuture.
Validates that the value is a Future.

name: $isInt
desc:
Cached instance of isInt.
Validates that the value is an int.

name: $isIntString
desc:
Cached instance of isIntString.
Validates that the string can be parsed as an integer.

name: $isIterable
desc:
Cached instance of isIterable.
Validates that the value is an Iterable.

name: $isList
desc:
Cached instance of isList.
Validates that the value is a List.

name: $isLowerCase
desc:
Cached instance of isLowerCase.
Validates that the string contains only lowercase characters.

name: $isMap
desc:
Cached instance of isMap.
Validates that the value is a Map.

name: $isNonEmptyList
desc:
Cached instance for a present (non-null AND non-empty) list.
Equivalent to: all([$isList, $listNotEmpty]).

name: $isNonEmptyString
desc:
Cached instance representing a non-empty String.
Equivalent to: all([$isString, not($isStringEmpty)]).
Valid when the value is a String and not empty.

name: $isNotNull
desc:
Cached instance representing NOT null (i.e. value must be non-null).
Equivalent to: not($isNull).

name: $isNull
desc:
Cached instance of isNull.
Validates that the value is null.

name: $isNumString
desc:
Cached instance of isNumString.
Validates that the string can be parsed as a number.

name: $isNumber
desc:
Cached instance of isNumber.
Validates that the value is a num (int or double).

name: $isRecord
desc:
Cached instance of isRecord.
Validates that the value is a Record.

name: $isSet
desc:
Cached instance of isSet.
Validates that the value is a Set.

name: $isStrictUrl
desc:
Cached instance of isStrictUrl.
Validates that the string is a valid URL with strict requirements.

name: $isString
desc:
Cached instance of isString.
Validates that the value is a String.

name: $isStringEmpty
desc:
Cached instance of isStringEmpty.
Validates that the value is empty (string, list, map, etc.).

name: $isSymbol
desc:
Cached instance of isSymbol.
Validates that the value is a Symbol.

name: $isUpperCase
desc:
Cached instance of isUpperCase.
Validates that the string contains only uppercase characters.

name: $isUrl
desc:
Cached instance of isUrl.
Validates that the string is a valid URL.

name: $isUuidV4
desc:
Cached instance of isUuidV4.
Validates that the string is a valid UUID v4.

name: $listEmpty
desc:
Cached instance of listEmpty.
Validates that the list is empty.

name: $listNotEmpty
desc:
Cached instance of not applied to $listEmpty.
Validates that the list is not empty.

name: $optionalNonEmptyList
desc: Cached instance for a nullable non-empty list (null passes, empty list fails).

name: $optionalNonEmptyString
desc:
Cached instance for optional (nullable) non-empty string: accepts null OR a non-empty string.
Usage: $optionalNonEmptyString.validate(null) -> valid; .validate('') -> invalid.

name: AsyncValidatorException
desc: Thrown when a synchronous validate() call encounters an async validator chain.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ValidatorFailedException
desc: Thrown when a validation fails and validateOrThrow() is used.

name: message
desc: Primary human friendly message.

name: summary
desc: Machine friendly summary (single line) for logs.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: Expectation
desc: Represents an expectation for a validation result.

name: addToPath
desc: Append additionalPath to the current path.

name: code
desc: Optional machineâ€‘readable code (e.g. 'type_mismatch', 'required_missing')

name: data
desc: Optional structured metadata (e.g. {'expectedType': 'String', 'foundType': 'int'})

name: description
desc: Get a detailed description of the expectation.

name: path
desc: The path to the value being validated. i.e. 'user.name'

name: toInvalidResult
desc: Convenient method to convert the expectation to an invalid result.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: expectation
desc: Creates an expectation for a validation result.

name: ExpectationCodes
desc: Centralized expectation code constants to avoid typos.

name: operator &
desc: Combines two validators with a logical AND, same as using all

name: operator >
desc: Returns a new validator that will return the error message if the validation fails

name: operator |
desc: Combines two validators with a logical OR, same as using any

name: validate
desc:
Returns a Validator that checks a value against the eskema provided,
the eskema defines a validator for each item in the list

name: isNotValid
desc: Checks if the map is not valid against the provided validator.

name: isValid
desc: Checks if the map is valid against the provided validator.

name: validate
desc: Validates the map against the provided validator.

name: result
desc: Represents the result of a validation.

name: Result
desc: Represents the result of a validation.

name: copyWith
desc: Creates a copy of the result with the given parameters.

name: expectations
desc:
The list of expectations for the validation result.
It will contain expectations independent of the validation result.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: transformers
desc: Transformers

name: transformers.boolean
desc: Boolean type transformers.

name: toBool
desc: Coerces a value to a boolean (standard mode).

name: toBoolLenient
desc: Lenient / permissive bool coercion.

name: toBoolStrict
desc: Strict bool coercion.

name: transformers.core
desc: Core transformer utilities and helpers.

name: expectPreserveValue
desc:
Adds an expectation message while preserving the child's resulting value
(useful for coercions where later constraints rely on the coerced type even on failure).

name: pivotValue
desc: Unified helper for value pivoting operations.

name: transform
desc: Transforms a value using a provided function.

name: transformers.datetime
desc: Date and time transformers.

name: toDateTime
desc: Coerces a value to a DateTime.

name: transformers.json
desc: JSON transformers.

name: toJsonDecoded
desc: Coerces a JSON string into its decoded form (Map/List). Leaves existing Map/List untouched.

name: transformers.map
desc: Map and structure transformers.

name: flattenMapKeys
desc:
Flattens a nested Map structure into a single-level Map using the provided delimiter.
Only flattens nested Maps (non-Map values become leaves). Arrays/lists are left as-is.

name: getField
desc: Extracts and validates a field from a map.

name: pickKeys
desc:
Picks a subset of keys from a Map, producing a new Map with only those keys present
(if they existed). Fails if input is not a Map.

name: pluckKey
desc: Plucks a single key's value from a Map (similar to getField but transform style).

name: transformers.number
desc: Number type transformers.

name: toBigInt
desc: Coerces value to a BigInt.

name: toDouble
desc: Coerces a value to a double.

name: toInt
desc: Coerces a value to an integer.

name: toIntSafe
desc: Safe integer coercion (strict + 53-bit range guard).

name: toIntStrict
desc: Strict integer coercion.

name: toNum
desc: Coerces a value to a number (num).

name: transformers.string
desc: String type transformers.

name: collapseWhitespace
desc: Collapse internal whitespace runs to a single space and trim ends.

name: split
desc: Splits a string into a list of substrings.

name: toLowerCase
desc: Transforms a string to lowercase.

name: toLowerCaseString
desc: Lowercase string (ASCII-focused; leaves non-letters unchanged).

name: toString
desc: Coerces a value to a String.

name: toUpperCase
desc: Transforms a string to uppercase.

name: toUpperCaseString
desc: Uppercase string.

name: trim
desc: Trims leading and trailing whitespace from a string.

name: trimString
desc: String normalizer (no type pivot): trim leading/trailing whitespace.

name: transformers.utility
desc: Utility transformers.

name: defaultTo
desc: Provides a default value if the input is null.

name: validator
desc: Backward-compatible export barrel for validator classes.

name: validator.base
desc: Core validator abstractions and base implementations.

name: IValidator
desc: Immutable base class from which all validators inherit.

name: IWhenValidator
desc: A special type of validator that can operate on a parent map context.

name: IdValidator
desc: Base class that adds an identifier to a validator (used by map/field validators).

name: Validator
desc: Generic implementation wrapper for a validator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ValidatorFunction
desc: Type representing a validator function (may be sync or async).

name: validator.combinators
desc: Validators that combine or branch logic (WhenValidator, Field).

name: AllValidator
desc: Succeeds if all child validators succeed. Fails on the first failure or collects all failures.

name: AnyValidator
desc: Succeeds if at least one child validator succeeds. Fails if all fail.

name: MultiValidatorBase
desc: An abstract base for validators that operate on a list of child validators.

name: NoneValidator
desc: Succeeds if all child validators fail. Fails if any succeed.

name: validator.map
desc: Map-oriented validators (schema / object validation helpers).

name: MapValidator
desc: Abstract class for schema-like map validators composed of Field/IdValidator instances.

name: validators
desc: Topâ€‘level builtâ€‘in validators and combinators.

name: validators.cached
desc: Cached Validators

name: validators.combinator
desc: Combinator Validators

name: all
desc: Passes the test if all of the Validators are valid, and fails if any of them are invalid

name: any
desc: Passes the test if any of the Validators are valid, and fails if any are invalid

name: none
desc: Passes the test if none of the validators pass

name: not
desc: Passes the test if the child validator is not valid

name: throwInstead
desc: Returns a Validator that throws a ValidatorFailedException instead of returning a result

name: withExpectation
desc:
Returns a IValidator that wraps the given child validator and adds the
provided error message to the result if the validation fails.
Preserves the underlying child's code and data (if the child failed).
See docs/expectation_codes.md.

name: validators.comparison
desc: Comparison Validators

name: contains
desc: Checks whether the given value contains the item value of type T

name: isDeepEq
desc: Checks whether the given value is equal to the otherValue value of type T

name: isEq
desc: Checks whether the given value is equal to the otherValue value of type T

name: isOneOf
desc: Checks whether the given value is one of the options values of type T

name: length
desc: Checks whether the given value has a length property and the length matches the validators

name: noop
desc: A validator that always returns valid

name: validators.date
desc: Date Validators

name: isDateAfter
desc: DateTime must be after (or equal if inclusive) given bound.

name: isDateBefore
desc: DateTime must be before (or equal if inclusive) given bound.

name: isDateBetween
desc: DateTime must fall within the interval.

name: isDateInFuture
desc: DateTime must be in the future.

name: isDateInPast
desc: DateTime must be in the past.

name: isDateSameDay
desc: DateTime must be same calendar day.

name: validators.json
desc: JSON Validators

name: isJsonArray
desc: Validates that value is a JSON array (List).

name: isJsonContainer
desc: Validates that value is a JSON container (Map or List).

name: isJsonObject
desc: Validates that value is a JSON object (Map with String keys).

name: jsonArrayEvery
desc: Ensures every element of array satisfies inner validator.

name: jsonArrayLength
desc: Ensures array length within bounds.

name: jsonHasKeys
desc: Ensures object has all specified keys (string).

name: validators.list
desc: List Validators

name: listContains
desc: Validates that the List contains item

name: listEmpty
desc: Validate that the list is empty

name: listIsOfLength
desc: Validates that it's a list of size length

name: listLength
desc: Validates that it's a List and the length matches the validators

name: validators.map
desc: Map Validators

name: containsKey
desc: Validator that checks if a map contains a specific key.

name: containsKeys
desc: Validator that checks if a map contains a specific set of keys.

name: containsValues
desc: Validator that checks if a map contains a specific set of values.

name: validators.number
desc: Number Validators

name: isGt
desc: Checks whether the given value is greater than min

name: isGte
desc: Checks whether the given value is greater or equal to min

name: isInRange
desc: Checks whether the given numeric value is within the range min, max (inclusive).

name: isLt
desc: Checks whether the given value is less than max

name: isLte
desc: Checks whether the given value is less than or equal max

name: validators.presence
desc: Presence Validators

name: nullable
desc:
If the field is not present (null) it will be considered valid
If you want to allow empty strings as valid, use optional instead

name: optional
desc:
If the field is not present, it will be considered valid, if present, it executes the validator.
It's different from nullable in that it also checks for empty strings

name: required
desc:
Opposite of optional, it will be considered valid if the field is not null
and the validator returns valid.

name: validators.string
desc: String Validators

name: isBoolString
desc: Validates that the String can be parsed as a bool ('true' or 'false', case insensitive)

name: isDate
desc: Checks whether the given value is a valid DateTime formatted String

name: isDoubleString
desc: Validates that the String can be parsed as a double (e.g. '123.45', '-1e3')

name: isEmail
desc: Validates that the String is a valid email address.

name: isIntString
desc: Validates that the String can be parsed as an int (e.g. '123', '-42')

name: isLowerCase
desc: Validates that it's a String and it's lowecase

name: isNumString
desc: Validates that the String can be parsed as a num (int or double)

name: isStringEmpty
desc: Checks whether the given string is empty

name: isUpperCase
desc: Validates that it's a String and it's uppercase

name: isUrl
desc: Validates that the String is a valid URL. By it uses non-strict validation (like "example.com").

name: isUuidV4
desc: Validates that the String is a valid UUID (v4).

name: stringContains
desc: Validates that the String contains str

name: stringIsOfLength
desc: Validates that the String's length is the same as the provided size

name: stringLength
desc: Validates that the String's length matches the validators

name: stringMatchesPattern
desc: Validates that the String matches the provided pattern

name: validators.structure
desc: Structure Validators

name: eskema
desc: Returns a Validator that checks a value against a Map eskema that declares a validator for each key.

name: eskemaList
desc:
Returns a Validator that checks a value against the eskema provided,
the eskema defines a validator for each item in the list

name: eskemaStrict
desc:
Returns a Validator that checks a value against a Map eskema and fails if
any keys exist in the map that are not defined in the schema.

name: listEach
desc: Returns a Validator that runs itemValidator for each item in the list

name: validators.type
desc: Type Validators

name: isBool
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a bool
For better performance and readability, use the $isBool variable directly.

name: isDateTime
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a DateTime
For better performance and readability, use the $isDateTime variable directly.

name: isDouble
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a double
For better performance and readability, use the $isDouble variable directly.

name: isEnum
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Enum
For better performance and readability, use the $isEnum variable directly.

name: isFunction
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Function
For better performance and readability, use the $isFunction variable directly.

name: isFuture
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Future
For better performance and readability, use the $isFuture variable directly.

name: isInt
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a int
For better performance and readability, use the $isInt variable directly.

name: isIterable
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Iterable
For better performance and readability, use the $isIterable variable directly.

name: isList
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a List
For better performance and readability, use the $isList variable directly.

name: isMap
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Map
For better performance and readability, use the $isMap variable directly.

name: isNull
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is null
For better performance and readability, use the $isNull variable directly.

name: isNumber
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a num
For better performance and readability, use the $isNumber variable directly.

name: isRecord
desc: Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Record

name: isSet
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Set
For better performance and readability, use the $isSet variable directly.

name: isString
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a String
For better performance and readability, use the $isString variable directly.

name: isSymbol
desc:
Returns a IValidator that checks if the given value is a Symbol
For better performance and readability, use the $isSymbol variable directly.

name: isType
desc: Returns a Validator that checks if the given value is the correct type

name: isTypeOrNull
desc: Returns a Validator that checks if the given value is the correct type
